message.content: Web3 refers to the next generation of the web that aims to decentralize control by using blockchain technology. It involves smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), and cryptocurrencies to create a more open and user-controlled internet.

result.text: Web3 refers to the next generation of the web that aims to decentralize control by using blockchain technology. It involves smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), and cryptocurrencies to create a more open and user-controlled internet.
